page.title: 06METROPOLITAN POLICE COLLEGE
page.content: The Metropolitan Police Training College occupies a site of 65 acres at Aerodrome Road, Hendon NW9.The facility provides training for police cadets, basic training for recruits, and courses for serving officers. Police cadets enter Hendon at 16 years of age and remain on the cadets course until the age of 18. Police recruits who meet the entry requirements of fitness ,height and academic qualifications ( 5 'o' levels or who pass the police entry examination ) spend the first 20 weeks of their two year basic training at Hendon. Courses for serving officers in tele- communications, driving, C.I.D., management and promotion are also held at Hendon.The total number of students at any one time is 3000 ( 1400 are residential ) with a teaching staff of 500.
